keys: Ciencia SESE. Fuerzas de energía. Plan de lección
resource_data:

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4383</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Comparing the Strength of Magnets</string>
            <string language="es">Comparación de la fuerza de imanes</string>
            <string language="ga">Láidreacht Mhaighnéid a chur i gComparáid</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vergleichen der Stärke der Magneten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Comparer la force des aimants</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Comparando a força dos ímãs</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Confrontare la resistenza dei magneti</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύγκριση της δύναμης των μαγνητών</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This resource consists of detailed teacher's notes for a lesson which requires pupils to devise a fair way of measuring/comparing the strengths of two or more magnets.</string>
            <string language="es">Este recurso incluye notas de profesor detalladas para una lección que requiere que los alumnos ideen una forma correcta de medir/comparar las fuerzas de dos o más imanes.</string>
            <string language="ga">Tá nótaí múinteora sonracha don cheacht san acmhainn seo ina gcaithfidh daltaí bealach féaráilte a aimsiú chun láidreacht mhaighnéid a thomhais/chur i gcomparáid.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">SESE Science</string>
            <string language="es">Ciencia SESE. Fuerzas de energía. Plan de lección</string>
            <string language="ga">OSIE Eolaíocht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">EnergyForces</string>
            <string language="ga">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Lesson Plan</string>
            <string language="ga">Plean Ceachta</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Hilfsmittel besteht aus Anmerkungen des 
ausführlichen Lehrers für eine Lektion, die Schüler benötigt, eine
angemessene Methode von measuring/comparing zu planen die Stärken von
zwei oder mehr Magneten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette ressource se compose des notes du 
professeur détaillé pour une leçon qui exige des élèves de 
trouver un moyen juste de measuring/comparing les forces de deux 
aimants ou plus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este recurso consiste em notas do professor 
detalhado para uma lição que requeira os alunos planejar uma maneira
justa de measuring/comparing as forças de dois ou mais ímãs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa risorsa consiste delle note 
dell'insegnante dettagliato per una lezione che richiede agli allievi 
di inventare un modo giusto di measuring/comparing le resistenze di 
due o più magneti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το στοιχείο συμπεριφοράς αποτελείται από τις 
λεπτομερείς σημειώσεις του δασκάλου για ένα μάθημα που απαιτεί 
τους μαθητές για να επινοήσει έναν δίκαιο τρόπο/τις δυνάμεις 
δύο ή περισσότερων μαγνητών.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">SESE Wissenschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion-Plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science de SESE</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">EnergyForces</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
